Title: To Do List
Text:
09:00 AM: Meet Priest Alessio to confirm the next delivery of ████████.
11:00 AM: Fast and pray.
12:30 PM: Go through the Passage of Penance. Bring goods.
Note: Last shipment disguised as Cathedral vegetables, but boxes not retrieved. The new money may have been suspicious.
16:00 PM: Deliver the goods to venue and wait for ████████████.
PS: Don't look at them, especially in the eyes.
The promised day is at hand. May the Divinity bless and protect the faithful and unleash havoc to the non-believers.
